attributes.action: All policies suggested for by unelected organisations to be put to referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK GOVERNMENT is beholden to the citizens of the UK, NOT the W.H.O. , W.E.F of U.N., nor any other government or N.G.O. 
We vermently oppose ALL efforts by foreign entities, whether the UN, WEF or WHO or any other corporate organisations to impose policies on the national sovereignty of the UK.
attributes.background: Putting to a referendum any policies impacting British citizens, suggested by unelected organisations, such as the UN,WEF or WHO

rejection.details:
Furthermore, any policies suggested by external organisations are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could submit a petition based on a specific policy which you object to.
